quiz.quiz-2-problem: How would your friends describe you?
quiz.quiz-4-problem: Which season do you love the most?
quiz.quiz-5-problem: If you are at a Party, Choose your drinks!
quiz.quiz-6-problem: You are going out today! What Scent of Perfume will you use?
quiz.quiz-7-problem: It’s time for decorations, Choose your favorite ornaments!
quiz.quiz-8-problem: Who do you want to be with on Christmas day?
quiz.quiz-9-problem: What type of Christmas gift do you want to give to your beloved person?
quiz.quiz-10-problem: It’s time for wishes, write your wish to Santa here! Ho Ho Ho!🎄

result.result-1-title: A cool and independent soul, finding joy quietly observing others while keeping a chill and laid-back vibes
result.result-1-desc: You bring a cool breeze to every holiday moment! You are a uniquely cool and independent person, finding happiness in observing others. Your cozy home is your relaxed haven that makes you feel calm and at peace.
result.result-2-title: A neutral character who always seeks balance in every situation
result.result-2-desc: You are the mediator when things get complicated.  You always create a perfect balance of happiness and peace! but you love to be with people and enjoy some quiet time too. Your presence brings positivity to your friends!
result.result-3-title: A brave, disciplined leader who always stands for peace
result.result-3-desc: You are the quiet strength everyone relies on. Your bravery and discipline help you bring peace to even the most chaotic situations >< You have your own charm and your presence always make people feel calm and pleasant
result.result-4-title: An artistic and modern that always has the perfect balance between creativity and casual socializing.
result.result-4-desc: You’re the aesthetics heart of the holidays! With your modern vibes and creative touch, you light up every room with a style. You love being around people just enough to share your artistic vibes, but you also treasure moments of calm to let your creativity flow.
result.result-5-title: Fun and trendy person who loves being surrounded by friends, embracing your playful and youthful auras.
result.result-5-desc: You’re the fun, playful one who’s always sticking close to your friends! With your trendy style and youthful energy, you bring joy to everyone that you meet!
result.result-6-title: A glamorous and charming character, full of beauty and elegance with every move.
result.result-6-desc: You are glamorous and cutesy, always catching people’s attention with your elegance and beauty! Your graceful movements and charms always create positive vibes to your friends!
result.result-7-title: fun-loving, party-ready person who brings energy and joy to every gathering
result.result-7-desc: You’re the life of the party! You are always full of energy and fun because you know how to turn every moment into a celebration. With your extroverted nature and love for a good time, you make sure everyone’s having the best party during the holidays!
result.result-8-title: A playful, mysterious character who is rarely seen but always leaves a lasting impression.
result.result-8-desc: You are the hidden magic of Christmas!  Your playful, mysterious nature keeps people guessing, and every time you appear, it’s a moment to treasure. You bring a sense of excitement and wonder that can’t be found anywhere else.
result.result-9-title: A playful, mysterious character who is rarely seen but always leaves a lasting impression.
result.result-9-desc: You are the hidden magic of Christmas!  Your playful, mysterious nature keeps people guessing, and every time you appear, it’s a moment to treasure. You bring a sense of excitement and wonder that can’t be found anywhere else.
result.result-10-title: A trendy, stylish character with a love for all things aesthetic, especially new places and cool vibes.
result.result-10-desc: You’re always the trendsetter! You inspire others with your fashionable choices and love for all things aesthetic. Whether it’s a chic café to visit or exploring the latest trends, you make everything look effortlessly stylish and cool.

swipe.desc: Greetings from Swipe! We're Chulalongkorn students who passionate on creating a positive impact for new generation. Watch out for our application and stay tuned on App Store! 👀🌟
